Apply interface-design principles: proximity, discoverability, and reduced cognitive distance between action and effect.

Make page header sticky on scroll
description: As the user scrolls down the page, the header scrolls off-screen. Apply interface-design principles: persistent navigation improves wayfinding and reduces interaction cost (no scroll-to-top to navigate). title: Fix concatenated words in Cherry Arbor Design blog articles
description: Many blog posts in src/content/cad-blog/ have missing spaces before and after markdown links, causing words to concatenate. This is a conversion artifact from the Docusaurus migration. Examples: 'At[Cherry Arbor Design]' should be 'At [Cherry Arbor Design]', 'Others are[aperiodic]' should be 'Others are [aperiodic]', 'tiles.We' should be 'tiles. We'. Pattern: spaces were dropped before opening brackets and after closing parentheses of markdown links. Affects most of the 32 .mdx files in src/content/cad-blog/.
